response.answer_text: You need a music publisher to pitch your songs to labels and artists. The best way to get a music publisher is to write a load of quality songs that evoke the current songs that are doing well - or perhaps you could associate with current artists that are doing well. After that, target some publishers.. find out who works there, their email address and send them an email with a short, to the point message with a link to a SoundCloud playlist with the songs. Once you find a publisher willing to pitch your songs, they'll send it to labels etc and hopefully someone will bite. You can also go down the route of music libraries. Your song/s will be put on an album of other songs in a similar style, and it'll be advertised to TV production companies etc who might use your song on a TV show or advert and you will split the royalties with the library music publisher.
